TopicTitle: [Old] Dark Days - Dying of the light. - Kopernicus mod. (Continuation in works)

Articles.Content:
Alright sorry I guess i will have to try to make them myself. It wont be easy though considering that the best stuff i've done is a textured cube.

One thing you could do is add no parts, but have a list of suggested mods to make it possible to reach other stars, such as roverdude's orion drive, maybe those OPT spaceplane parts.

One thing you could do is add no parts, but have a list of suggested mods to make it possible to reach other stars, such as roverdude's orion drive, maybe those OPT spaceplane parts.

This is true as well.

Add a required mod list, along with distributing your own custom tech tree, and module manager files to edit the parts how you see fit (along with placeing them were you want in the tech tree)
Thanks guys for your suggestions but i think a new part pack to be very necessary embedded into the mod so i plan to go with rabidninjawombats suggestion. I promise to give credit and ask first.
Im having a hard time finding good candidates. Could anyone give me a few pointers?

Im having a hard time finding good candidates. Could anyone give me a few pointers?

If you're going interstellar, nuclear pulse drives are the only way to go, so I suggest roverdude's new orion drive, also roverdude's other base building mods. There's also something called pathfinder. You could use a mod's resource system to make it harder.

If you're going interstellar, nuclear pulse drives are the only way to go, so I suggest roverdude's new orion drive, also roverdude's other base building mods. There's also something called pathfinder. You could use a mod's resource system to make it harder.

Good idea. As for the pulse drive i am already planning on the alcubierre drive.

Good idea. As for the pulse drive i am already planning on the alcubierre drive.

Ah, then you may want to make some kind of config for KSP-I.

Edited September 29, 2015 by daniel l.

Hi this is a quick update,

Development kopernicus wise is going fine however i have found that i am terrible at 3d modeling and texturing for the parts, I would apprecitate the help of someone who can do modeling, texturing, engines, and iva's. i will make the config files but i need models, i could do them myself but i am terrible and i want you guys to have the best

I have quite a few years of experience with Photoshop under my belt. So if your offer still stands, I would be more then happy to help you out with some of the textures or artwork.

I have quite a few years of experience with Photoshop under my belt. So if your offer still stands, I would be more then happy to help you out with some of the textures or artwork.

Yes my offer does still stand And i could use your help. From time to time i may send you a model to work on, the design style i was thinking of would be very futuristic with lots of glowy bits and tron lines.
Daniel, congrats on 500 posts
Daniel, congrats on 500 posts
